content.en: Drone delivery optimization: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to solve different problems related to the use of drones in delivery services. These algorithms aim to minimize operational costs, optimize routing, and solve complex scheduling problems. By using mixed-integer programming models, branch-and-cut algorithms, and heuristic approaches, these algorithms offer efficient solutions for integrating drones into last-mile delivery systems.
content.da: Optimering af dronelevering: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer til at løse diverse problemer relateret til brugen af droner i leveringsservice. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at minimere driftsomkostninger, optimere ruteplanlægning og løse komplekse skemalægningsproblemer. Ved at bruge mixede heltalsprogrammeringsmodeller, branch-and-cut algoritmer og heuristiske tilgange, tilbyder disse algoritmer effektive løsninger til integration af droner i sidste mils leveringssystemer.
